item.title: Version 0.0.6
item.description:
## What's New
### Select All for Bulk Actions Easily select all clipboard items to perform bulk operations like delete or export.
- **Select All button** - Appears in the toolbar when items exist - **Keyboard shortcut** - Press âŒ˜A to select all items instantly - **Filter-aware** - Respects your current filters (type, search, advanced filters) - Example: Filter by "Text" then Select All to select only text items - **Smart selection bar** - Shows "X of Y selected" and offers Select All for partial selections
Perfect for cleaning up your clipboard history or exporting filtered subsets of items.
